divs: sighting detailsas before, i was sitting on my back porch, thinking about about the incedent a few hrs. earlier, when again the object appeared in the same general direction. i jumped up reached inside the door and grabbed my binoculars and camera that i left on the kitchen counter. i looked throughthe binoculars first and saw no flashing white lights and\ or green and red lights. i got the camera took 3 pictures and a movie of the object. on the first picture i had the flash on and got the stars in the background. the 2 & 3 picture no flash, nothing. on the movie i got the same, nothing.. i was watching the object over the camera during the pictures and movie. approx. 10 sec. after the movie, the object disapeared.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in New Washington
There was one other sighting in New Washington on or around July 4th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
